I see these names all the time for bot lane
This is cute and all, but what happens when one of them feeds or leaves them hanging.
Relationship counseling.
Played with a couple like this before. The bf was support shaco. On top of never getting sightstone, he used his gf adc as sacrificial bait.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadow Hazard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=skKtAlaq,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-08-22T06:40:58.554+0000)
>
> Played with a couple like this before. The bf was support shaco. On top of never getting sightstone, he used his gf adc as sacrificial bait.

Sounds like something I would do.
But what happens when one of them gets their off role? Personally I never get jungle or mid, seem to be pretty popular roles. If they ever play alone that'd be a bit odd too.
They both just que as mid and jungle and switch if they get the off role.
You have to cover all people +1. So in a duo, you must cover three positions. I wish it worked that way though :/

played a ranked game vs a couple the other day. It was weird as I looked up ranks and noticed two players on the enemy team were same rank with only a difference of like 18 lp and had almost as many wins with the same number of losses as each other. And this was after like 1000 games so figured it was not a coincidence. Sure enough.... said they were bf/gf. And omg... did they wreck us haha.
That's too cute <3
But what if the decide to main a different role
